Module org.calcmvc
Package org.calcmvc.controller

Class Controller<T>

java.lang.Object
org.calcmvc.common.misc.MyConcreteObservable
org.calcmvc.common.operation.CommonBase
org.calcmvc.controller.Controller<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of the operand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<CommonBase>, MyCommand, MyObservable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddLongController, DivLongController, MulLongController, QuitController, SquareLongController, SubLongController
public abstract class Controller<T> extends CommonBase
Controller independent of operand type. It handles both related model and view.
Author:
x. skapin

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Override Command#execute. This method gets the operands defined by the user using the view's instance, then executes the related operation model.
